code:
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

def print_next_week_dates():
    # This function prints the dates of the next 7 days from today
    today = datetime.now()
    for i in range(7):
        next_day = today + timedelta(days=i)
        print("Next day:", next_day.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))

def calculate_days_until_new_year():
    # This function calculates the number of days until New Year's Day
    today = datetime.now()
    new_year = datetime(today.year + 1, 1, 1)
    delta = new_year - today
    print("Days until New Year's Day:", delta.days)

def print_current_time():
    # This function prints the current time
    now = datetime.now()
    print("Current time:", now.strftime("%H:%M:%S"))

# Call the functions
print_next_week_dates()
calculate_days_until_new_year()
print_current_time()
